name: Creeping Deck
description:
Creeping Deck is a strategic roguelite deck-builder with RPG elements. Head out to discover mythological Ancient Egypt, put an end to corruption, and defeat Seth: the source of evil, chaos and pain. Do not worry, the Gods will help you!

  • 40 cards available to build your unique set of cards (more than 150 planned at the release) 
  • 5 types of enemies (more than 20 planned at the release)  
  • 5 levels of dungeons 
  • Ability, artifacts, potions & more to get stronger and more! 

WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2167550/Creeping_Deck_Pharaohs_Curse/ 

SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER

 https://tavroxgames.com/creeping-deck-newsletter-subscription/ 

ROADMAP 

  • January 12th - closed Alpha 
  • January 27th - open Beta 
  • Starting February 6th - Creeping Deck at the Steam Next Fest! 
  • Spring 2023 - Early Access release

Creeping Deck is the first collaboration of Tavrox Games and Miju Games, two indie game studios implanted in the same city in the south of France, joining forces to create challenging and strategic experiences through gaming!
